title: Url shortener
description: ShortURL allows to shorten long links from Instagram, Facebook, YouTube, Twitter, Linked In, blogs and sites.

title: Todo list App

title: Weather Forecast
description: Its a simple gui application using Python's Tkinter library, associated with a weather api to display weather forecast results for any city.
